name: minotaur
content:

a creature in ancient Greek stories that has the body of a human and the head of a bull (= male cow): King Theseus was the legendary ruler who slew the minotaur in the Cretan labyrinth. He encounters dragons, minotaurs and other mythic adversaries.
Craig Lovell/Corbis Documentary/Getty Images /GettyImages
